overview.en: Ideaology (IDEA) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Ideaology has a current supply of 500,000,000 with 12,381,578.89770748 in circulation. The last known price of Ideaology is 0.32044882 USD and is down -4.95 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 4 active market(s) with $263,789.48 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://ideaology.io.
